alert.note: Alert for Central Ventura County Valleys; Lake Casitas; Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast; Santa Clarita Valley; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued December 12 at 12:17PM PST until December 13 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 8 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 32 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley, Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast, Lake Casitas, Central Ventura County Valleys, Southeastern Ventura County Valleys and Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 8 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost can damage sensitive plants and harm pets if left unprotected.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Central Ventura County Valleys; Lake Casitas; Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast; Santa Clarita Valley; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys
